metadata.title: CVE-2020-6073 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the TXTrecord-parsing functionality of Videolabs libmicrodns 0.1.0. When parsingthe RDATA section in a TXT record in mDNS messages, multiple integeroverflows can be triggered, leading to a denial of service. An attacker cansend an mDNS message to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: vlc package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
